alert.note: Alert for Elbert (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued June 12 at 5:34PM MDT until June 12 at 7:00PM MDT by NWS Boulder
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM MDT TUESDAY... * WHAT...Small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...The Bijou Creek Basin in east central and northeast Colorado, including the following counties, in east central Colorado, Elbert. In northeast Colorado, Adams, Arapahoe and Morgan. * WHEN...Until 400 PM MDT Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, creeks, streams, and other low-lying and flood-prone locations is imminent or occurring. Low-water crossings are inundated with water and may not be passable. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 517 PM MDT, water was reported flowing into Morgen Co. Emergency management reported flooding along East Bijou Creek west of Agate in the warned area earlier today. Flooding is ongoing or expected to begin shortly. Between 2 and 3.5 inches of rain have fallen this afternoon in the upper part of the basin. - This includes the following streams and drainages... Bijou Creek basin including East Bijou, Middle Bijou and West Bijou Creeks and their tributaries.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
